tasks.label: Prepare PR body file
tasks.command: bash -lc 'tmp=$(mktemp); cp .github/pull_request_template.md "$tmp"; sed -i "s#<!-- paste exact prompt or link -->#Bootstrap governance workflows and PR template; normalize uses to local.#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#<!-- e.g., GitHub Copilot gpt-5 -->#GitHub Copilot gpt-5#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#<!-- UTC ISO-8601, e.g., 2025-09-12T14:23:45Z; NEVER ${...} -->#2025-09-16T10:00:00Z#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#<!-- @handle only (no names/emails) -->#@ErykKul#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#provider|deployer#deployer#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#\- \[ \] No secrets/PII#- [x] No secrets/PII#I" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#\- \[ \] Agent logging enabled#- [x] Agent logging enabled#I" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#\- \[ \] Kill-switch / feature flag present#- [x] Kill-switch / feature flag present#I" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#Risk classification: limited|high#Risk classification: limited#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#Personal data: yes|no#Personal data: no#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#DPIA: <link or N/A>#DPIA: N/A#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#Automated decision-making: yes|no#Automated decision-making: no#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#Agent mode used: yes|no#Agent mode used: yes#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#\- \[ \] No prohibited practices under EU AI Act#- [x] No prohibited practices under EU AI Act#I" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#\- \[ \] License/IP attestation#- [x] License/IP attestation#I" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#Attribution: <link or N/A>#Attribution: N/A#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#GPAI obligations: <link or N/A>#GPAI obligations: N/A#" "$tmp"; sed -i "s#Vendor GPAI compliance reviewed: <link or N/A>#Vendor GPAI compliance reviewed: N/A#" "$tmp"; echo "$tmp"'

tasks.label: Prepare PR body file (safe sed)
tasks.command: bash -lc 'tmp=$(mktemp); cp .github/pull_request_template.md "$tmp"; perl -0777 -pe "s/<!-- paste exact prompt or link -->/Bootstrap governance workflows and PR template; normalize uses to local./g; s/<!-- e.g., GitHub Copilot gpt-5 -->/GitHub Copilot gpt-5/g; s/<!-- UTC ISO-8601, e.g., 2025-09-12T14:23:45Z; NEVER \$\{\.\.\.\} -->/2025-09-16T10:00:00Z/g; s/<!-- @handle only (no names\/emails) -->/@ErykKul/g; s/provider\|deployer/deployer/g; s/- \[ \] No secrets\/PII/- [x] No secrets\/PII/ig; s/- \[ \] Agent logging enabled/- [x] Agent logging enabled/ig; s/- \[ \] Kill-switch \/ feature flag present/- [x] Kill-switch \/ feature flag present/ig; s/Risk classification: limited\|high/Risk classification: limited/g; s/Personal data: yes\|no/Personal data: no/g; s/DPIA: <link or N\/A>/DPIA: N\/A/g; s/Automated decision-making: yes\|no/Automated decision-making: no/g; s/Agent mode used: yes\|no/Agent mode used: yes/g; s/- \[ \] No prohibited practices under EU AI Act/- [x] No prohibited practices under EU AI Act/ig; s/- \[ \] License\/IP attestation/- [x] License\/IP attestation/ig; s/Attribution: <link or N\/A>/Attribution: N\/A/g; s/GPAI obligations: <link or N\/A>/GPAI obligations: N\/A/g; s/Vendor GPAI compliance reviewed: <link or N\/A>/Vendor GPAI compliance reviewed: N\/A/g;" -i "$tmp"; echo "$tmp"'
